commit.message: rename `cargo dev ra_setup` to `cargo dev ide_setup`

files.patch:
@@ -89,7 +89,7 @@ cargo dev update_lints
 # create a new lint and register it
 cargo dev new_lint
 # (experimental) Setup Clippy to work with IntelliJ-Rust
-cargo dev ra_setup
+cargo dev ide_setup
 ```
 
 ## lintcheck
